metadata.title: CVE-2019-11471 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libheif 1.4.0 has a use-after-free inheif::HeifContext::Image::set_alpha_channel in heif_context.h becauseheif_context.cc mishandles references to non-existing alpha images.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libheif-examples - 1.1.0-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
libheif1 - 1.1.0-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libheif package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
